title: Category-Based Logging Architecture
content:
Design decisions for logger.js:
1. Category IDs use kebab-case (e.g., 'url-detection', 'quick-tab-manager') for consistency
2. Each category has display name with emoji for visual identification
3. Async-first API: All filter checks are async to support browser.storage.local reads
4. Caching strategy: Settings loaded once and cached in memory, cleared on settings change via message passing
5. Independent filters: Live console and export have separate settings for maximum flexibility
6. Fail-safe defaults: Unknown categories default to enabled to prevent silent failures
7. Performance: Filter check before console.log() prevents unnecessary logging overhead
